title: Study Guide, Solutions Manual for Organic Chemistry. A Short Cou
description:
TITLE/EDITIONStudy Guide with Solutions Manual for Hart/Craine/Hart/Hadad's Organic Chemistry: A Short Course, 13th
By: Harold Hart (Author), Christopher M. Hadad (Author), Leslie E. Craine (Author), David J. Hart (Author)
Paperback: 432 pages
Publisher: Cengage Learning; 13 edition (January 14, 2011)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 111142585X
ISBN-13: 978-1111425852
NOTE: This is the standalone ebook and may not include access codes that come packaged with the bound book





Revised with the assistance of author Christopher Hadad, Ohio State University, the Study Guide and Solutions Manual offers solutions to both in-text and end-of-chapter problems with an explanation of the answers. For each chapter, the guide provides a chapter summary, learning objectives, and a summary of synthetic methods and reaction mechanisms. Review problems on synthesis and 100 multiple-choice sample test questions offer students additional problem-solving practice
